backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing validated contact form entries, providing submission and retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, related files, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all site pages using SiteLayout as root.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with client-side validation, success/error states, and backend submission integration.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with logo fallback, company info, navigation links, services, and updated contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header featuring logo fallback, desktop navigation, and mobile drawer menu with active highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Exports a Project interface and a list of sample solar project entries with details and benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and global base and utility rules.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Utility to set page SEO metadata including title, description, and Open Graph tags.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, company overview, vision, mission, and director info.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with SEO setup, contact details, office locations, and a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component with hero content, service highlights, testimonial data, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Projects portfolio page displaying project stats, featured projects, and SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services page defining multiple solar service offerings with features and SEO initialization.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing site goals, required assets, features, issues, and pending requests.
